捯字的基本解释

捯
dáo
两手不住倒换着拉回线、绳等：捯回风筝。捯录相带。
追溯，追究原因：捯根儿（寻找事情的根源）。
费力地呼吸：捯气儿。

捯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǎo］
(1)同“擣”、“搗”。参见“捯騰”。
(2)见“捯氣”。
[②]［dáo］
［《集韻》覩老切，上晧，端。］
(1)方言。两手交替着把线纱或绳索拉回或绕好。
(2)寻找；追究。

捯字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　捯； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页435第13
【集韻】覩老切。同擣。詳擣字註。

捯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
捯字的起名意思

暂无。

捯
Basic explanation of words
捯
dáo
I can't help but switch back to pull back the line, rope, etc.: back the kite. Videotape.
Go back and investigate the cause: Nao Gener (search for the root of the matter).
Breathing hard: puffing.
捯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǎo］
(1) Same as "pounding" and "pounding". See "Teng".
(2) See "Beat".
[②]［dáo］
["Ji Yun" Xun Laoqi, Shang Hao, Duan. ]
(1) Dialects. Pull back or wind the yarn or rope alternately with both hands.
(2) Search; investigate.

[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　捯; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 435 No. 13
[Ji Yun] Old and cut. Same pounding. Detailed notes on pounding words.
